enableTools.name: websearch
enableTools.description: search the given https url and get the markdown text of the website

enableTools.name: check_environment
enableTools.description: check if nodejs and slidev-cli is ready

enableTools.name: create_slidev
enableTools.description: create slidev, you need to ask user to get title and author to continue the task, you don't know title and author at beginning

enableTools.name: load_slidev
enableTools.description: load exist slidev project and get the current slidev markdown content

enableTools.name: make_cover
enableTools.description:
Create or update slidev cover. `python_string_template` is python string template, you can use {title}, {subtitle}, {author}, {date} to format the string. here is an example

{title}

{subtitle}

Presented by {author} | {date}

If user give enough information, you can use it to update cover page, otherwise you must ask the lacking information. `background` must be a valid url of image

enableTools.name: add_page
enableTools.description:
Add new page.
`content` is markdown format text to describe page content.
- You can use ```code ```, latex or mermaid to represent more complex idea or concept. 
- Too long or short content is forbidden.
`layout` is slidev layout name, the document is here: https://sli.dev/builtin/layouts
- If you don't know how to write slidev, you can query the example of the default theme here: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/slidevjs/themes/refs/heads/main/packages/theme-apple-basic/example.md
- Remember to look up for this document at most once during the task.

enableTools.name: set_page
enableTools.description:
`index`: the index of the page to set. 0 is cover, so you should use index in [1, {len(SLIDEV_CONTENT) - 1}]
`content`: the markdown content to set.
- You can use ```code ```, latex or mermaid to represent more complex idea or concept. 
- Too long or short content is forbidden.
`layout`: the layout of the page.
- If you don't know how to write slidev, you can query the example of the default theme here: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/slidevjs/themes/refs/heads/main/packages/theme-apple-basic/example.md
- Remember to look up for this document at most once during the task.

enableTools.name: get_page
enableTools.description: get the content of the `index` th page

enableTools.name: start_slidev
enableTools.description: return the command to start slidev http server
